ANU.name: Philip Keightley
ANU.biography: Dr Philip Keightley lectures at the ANU Medical School. He works clinically in perinatal psychiatry for Canberra Health Services and is the ACT Director for Psychiatry Training. He has particular clinical and research interests in health systems research, psychotherapy in the medically ill, and perinatal psychiatry.
